data.text:
The Zero Point is exposed, but no one escapes the Loop, not on your watch.

Recruit the greatest hunters across all Realities to stop the Island from falling into complete Chaos.

#FortniteZeroPoint https://t.co/U6TCRFI566

The victor of countless battles against gods and valkyries, Kratos turns to tackle the chaos of an exposed Zero Point.  

Grab Kratos in the Item Shop now! https://t.co/pc4nxewWxP

We're honored to be nominated for the Player's Voice category this year at @thegameawards!

Round 1 is open for a limited time - vote now and find out who wins live.
👉 https://t.co/tNKLY6A0ff

Thank you Bus Drivers 🎉 https://t.co/3usabrlqq3

Stay on your toes or face the fury of this festive warrior.

Grab the Tinseltoes Outfit in the Item Shop now! https://t.co/PDP0mQ4sVR

This is the way...

Through Dec 31, 2020, get up to 2 months of Disney+ on us when you make any real money purchase in-game. New Disney+ subscribers aged 18+ only. Select countries only, offer varies by country.

More info: https://t.co/axxFV3xYNq https://t.co/VYi90XhQyg

This weekend — Dec 5 & 6 — the best college @FortniteGame trios in North America, $100k on the line. We're gonna crown a Fall 2020 Champion.

🕔 : 5 PM ET
📺: https://t.co/AAYTwpLiNZ https://t.co/eiNSZxo3qz

Introducing Fortnite Bars and Bounties!

Fortnite Bars are a new in-game currency earned through activities completed in matches such as collecting Bounties. Finish a Bounty and earn more bars.

Info here: https://t.co/Euk4Fo0WDr

#FortniteSeason5 is here and with it, the Fortnite Crew subscription offer is now available 🎉

Get the Battle Pass for the Season, the exclusive Galaxia Crew Pack and 1,000 V-Bucks each month. Next month’s Crew Pack will be revealed later this month!

https://t.co/rYjF0L5TF4

It's a Celebration!

Compete in the Bhangra Boogie Cup on Dec 6 for a chance to win in-game goodies AND a OnePlus 8T, the only phone to run Fortnite at 90FPS, thanks to our friends @OnePlus!

All prizing and details here: https://t.co/6NwXZGcExS https://t.co/4luhrfQq8z

Join the Hunt.

The Zero Point has been unearthed and Agent Jones needs the help from the greatest Hunters there are. Fight alongside The Mandalorian, explore new locations, complete Bounties and stop the Chaos.

#FortniteZeroPoint begins now. https://t.co/TykRLCsIUU

:: Incoming Audio Transmission - Reality Log 982 ::  #6 of 6

Target Description: Bubbly and… Chaotic…

Data Transfer - Complete. Final Data Process Commencing

Season 5 - 12.2.2020 https://t.co/K11MPKiGdG

:: Incoming Audio Transmission - Reality Log 3258 ::  #5 of 6
Target Description: Sweet and… Delicious?

Reply With Confirmation Code “#Breakfast” To Accept Next Transmission https://t.co/AsSOUPOBLt

We defeated him! A record 15.3 million concurrent players joined forces in our biggest event ever to fight back Galactus in today's in-game event, while more than 3.4 million cheered and watched on @YouTubeGaming and @Twitch! https://t.co/IAcNpcPKEw

:: Incoming Audio Transmission - Reality Log [Data Not Found] ::  #4 of 6
Target Description: [Data Not Found]

Reply With Confirmation Code “#Laser” To Accept Next Transmission https://t.co/GY8wtdPNzg

:: Incoming Audio Transmission - Reality Log 312 ::  #3 of 6
Target Description: Fierce, Brave… Intimidating

Reply With Confirmation Code “#Warrior” To Accept Next Transmission https://t.co/tjH5JPg6VP

:: Incoming Audio Transmission - Reality Log 42 :: #2 of 6
Target Description: Spirit - Vengeful

Reply With Confirmation Code “#Revenge” To Accept Next Transmission https://t.co/dwiz2n5DoH

:: Incoming Audio Transmission - Reality Log 1987 ::  #1 of 6
Target Description: Defender - Shapeshifter

Reply With Confirmation Code “#Wildheart” To Accept Next Transmission https://t.co/gqnU4Nw3fw

Zero Point - - Unstable - Project Hunter
:: Beginning Upload ::
Reply With Code “#Bounty” to Accept Transmission https://t.co/zZNOoQH9Xl

Status: Galactus defeated! Thanks for your efforts.

Fortnite is currently in a prep state for Chapter 2 - Season 5 (v15.00). Server downtime for the update begins December 2 at 12 AM ET (05:00 UTC) and is expected to run until approx. 4 AM ET (09:00 UTC). Stay tuned for updates. https://t.co/yvTdmpOwx7
The fight against Galactus begins on the Helicarrier. You’re in the right place! https://t.co/MIcprYpVIt
Heroes, get ready to take on the Devourer of Worlds. Doors to the event will open at 3:30 PM ET but we suggest you jump in game now and start preparing for battle. https://t.co/tMGNHj9HDs

Don't get caught snoozing! Take cozy to the battlefield with comfy slippers and cuddly pajamas inspired by @sharktoofs1.

Get the Bedhead Brigade Set in the Item Shop now! https://t.co/YJvdEsDgSw

The Battle Bus is locked and loaded. Now we wait for the big guy.

Galactus is on the horizon.

12.1.20 4 PM ET https://t.co/6hEcMqgbIw

This #CyberMonday, get a special #NintendoSwitch Fortnite Wildcat Bundle, including: 

✔️A uniquely designed Nintendo Switch system and dock
✔️Yellow and Blue Joy-Con
✔️Fortnite game pre-installed
✔️2,000 V-Bucks
✔️A download code for The Wildcat Bundle 

https://t.co/582Uxjlfg0 https://t.co/tdncWlfIzk

Gear up with @benjyfishy's handpicked Locker Bundle and strike with an unforgettable mark.

The Benjyfishy Locker Bundle is available in the Item Shop now! https://t.co/yeP07r6Mwl
Galactus doesn’t stand a chance, bub. https://t.co/TuRIPexezp

The undefeated champs. 

Take home the win with the @NFL Gridiron Gang Outfits before they leave the Item Shop. https://t.co/u7qbcCPWbJ

Dance a lil different. 

Grab the Smeeze Emote by @chonkieftutz in the Item Shop now! https://t.co/BfyJDGCUqR

You do know how to drive the Battle Bus.. right?

Join the Fight on 12.1.20 4 PM ET https://t.co/8K380f03P1
Dropping in with perfect stealth, the @Ninja Set is back! https://t.co/jLcmgLMl6D
Full of joy and bursting with color, the sweet @Loserfruit Set is back! https://t.co/egdThYum3N
Favorite Nexus War moment so far? https://t.co/uWFuhxeVxZ

He hungers for the Zero Point. 

Galactus is closing in. 

12.1.20 4 PM ET. https://t.co/VbzWJ5NWqF

Thanks for jumping off the Battle Bus with us!

Because of you we are up for THREE nominations for @thegameawards this year. 
⟶ Best Community Support
⟶ Best Ongoing Game
⟶ Best Esports Game

Vote here: https://t.co/KzlA8QDaol https://t.co/tB0tG2ijXc
We are investigating an issue were the Darkfire Bundle is not appearing in the Item Shop. We'll provide an update when we have more information. https://t.co/LQxxXmiJyo

Rocking out in the darkness and burning bright in the shadows.

The Darkfire Pack returns as a Black Friday Offer in the Item Shop Now! https://t.co/QDk4oNw7jR

Week 4 of the XP Xtravaganza Challenges is here!

Complete these Challenges for a bunch of XP to finish out the Battle Pass strong. https://t.co/OLnHY6v3Op
